titleStmt.title: Mr. Edward Dering, his godly priuate prayers for Christian families Whereunto is annexed, his briefe and necessary catechisme for housholders.
titleStmt.author: Dering, Edward, 1540?-1576.
Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.

notesStmt.note: Preface to the reader signed: Tho: Cooper.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
